channel.title: Offering a Persocom
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Offering a Persocom"

item.title: Re: Offering a Persocom
item.content:encoded: I have a bear coat among my extra stuff. PM Tenchu G if you're interested

item.title: Re: Offering a Persocom
item.content:encoded: Got another Persocom, so that makes 2.Need a Kaiju Memento now (I know it's not that fair, but I need it).Also looking for monster items with +strength enchantments.

item.title: Offering a Persocom
item.content:encoded: Got a spare Persocom, willing to trade it for any kaiju drop.In need of a Soul of Steel right now (doing Mono) but any other good ones will do. Note - I already have Regalia, Fruits Basket, Carapace Armor, Plug Suit, Magical Wand, Pokerballs, Late-Night Snack, Hacksaw.
